rease
Class TopologyParameters

java.lang.Object
  rease.TopologyParameters

public class TopologyParameters
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the parameters for creation of a realistic topology

Version:
1.0-developer version
Author:
Pascal Zschumme, Thomas Gamer

                                                 throws java.lang.Exception

getTransitNodeThresh

public int getTransitNodeThresh()
Get method for transitNodeThresh

Returns:
Nodes with connection degree greater than returned value are declared as core nodes independent of algorithm result
